title: 10 Chess Books on Combinations & Tactics (gnv64)
description:
The world Chess Championship is currently underway at Chennai, India between defending champion Vishy Anand & challenger Magnus Carlsen. The first 4 games of the match have ended in draws So this is an apt occasion to upload some chess books!
This torrent contains a collection of chess books on middlegame tactics & combinations. The fifth book is on openings. The first is in DJVU format, rest are all PDFs:

01. Anthology of Chess Combinations by Chess Informant (2005)
02. Chess Tactics for Champions by Sysan Polgar & Paul Truong (2006)
03. Encyclopedia of Chess Combinations (4th Ed) by Chess Informant (20012)
04. How to Calculate Chess Tactics by Valeri Beim (2006)
05. Modern Chess Openings (14th Ed) by Nick de Firmian (1999)
06. Sharpen Your Chess Tactics in 7 Days by Gary Lane (2009)
07. The Basis of Combination in Chess by Julius Du Mont
08. The Chess Kid's Book of Tactics by Davod MacEnulty (2003)
09. The Golden Treasury of Chess by Israel Albert Horowitz (1971)
10. The Penguin Book of Chess Positions by C.H.O'D, Alexander (1973)
